pullrequest.title: Set the pose of a visual

content.raw:
I see what you mean, returning zero if the pose is not set sounds good to me.

I was just worried that we might be ignoring the initial visual pose, so I changed the test to a case where the visual pose is explicitly set in the SDF, see this [pull request](https://bitbucket.org/ocrave/gazebo/pull-requests/6/merge-with-default-and-add-explicit-visual/diff).
content.html:
I see what you mean, returning zero if the pose is not set sounds good to me.

I was just worried that we might be ignoring the initial visual pose, so I changed the test to a case where the visual pose is explicitly set in the SDF, see this pull request.
